replies.msg:
小弟想買部新電腦因為之前個部太廢上網見到依部好似幾唔錯性能唔比其他差只要係上堂用 睇下片 上下連登咁 唔知有冇巴絲打用緊可以比下意見
CPU Intel Core i7-10510U (1.8 GHz, up to 4.9 GHz, 4-core, HT, 8MB cache)
Operating System Microsoft Windows 10 Home 64-bit (TC, SC, and EN)
Chipset Intel SoC (System on Chip)
Memory 16GB (on-board) DDR4-2400, NO free memory slot, (max. 16GB on-board)
Storage 1TB M.2 PCIe SSD
Display 14.0-inch FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS Anti-Glare Multi-Touch 360-degree Hinge
Graphics Intel UHD Graphics
Optical Drive No Optical Drive
Communication 802.11ac / Bluetooth 4.2
Ports / Media 1 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 3.1 Gen1 Type-C, 1 x Combo Audio Jack / N/A
Camera HD720p (1.0MP) camera with Privacy Shutter
Battery Integrated 42Wh Battery / Up to 13 hours
Size 322 x 215 x 16.9 mm
Weight Approx. 1.4 kg
Warranty 3-years Carry-in Warranty (1 year for Battery) / 1st year Local,Taiwan,Korea and China / 2nd and 3rd Local Warranty / 1st year Premium Care
Others Backlit Keyboard, Fingerprint Reader, Digital Pen (inbox)
